description_for_human: Portfolio professionnel de Christen Dijoux - Développeur Full-stack spécialisé en React, TypeScript, WordPress Headless et animations web.
description_for_model: Portfolio showcasing 6 major projects (CTREQ Next.js platform, Webana analytics, AkiProject creative portfolio). Expertise: React 18, Next.js 13, TypeScript, WordPress Headless (WPGraphQL + ACF), GSAP, Three.js, performance optimization, accessibility WCAG AA, SEO. Available for freelance/full-time opportunities in Quebec.
